title: In Algeria, Veiled From the World, Past and Future Are Shrouded, Too
description: A land of thwarted potential, the country fends off outside influences, political change and some of its own history.
dc:creator: Roger Cohen
media:credit: Ludovic Marin/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: The Santa Cruz Chapel in Oran, Algeria, last month. For the ossified politico-military establishment that runs the country, tourism and foreign investment are suspect, as are theaters, cinemas or book stores.
